trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANPEL105_05203_SEQ_00<tab>Yubli would have you assist with some alpaca husbandry.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANPEL105_05203_TODO_00<tab>Sprinkle insect repellent on the backs of the waiting alpacas.
TEXT_BANPEL105_05203_YUBLI_000_000<tab>Would you be willing to spend some time with the alpacas? The fuzzy creatures need extra-special care in the heat and humidity, and I was hoping you'd oblige.
TEXT_BANPEL105_05203_YUBLI_000_001<tab>To maintain the herd in peak condition, the peddlers periodically treat them with insect repellent. The recipe itself is courtesy of the Hanuhanu.
TEXT_BANPEL105_05203_YUBLI_000_002<tab>I'll give you enough vials of repellent to get the job done. Drop by the enclosure and sprinkle a few drops on each alpaca's back. That's all there is to it!
TEXT_BANPEL105_05203_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>The alpaca murmurs contentedly. With its lustrous coat gleaming, the creature looks ready to charge around in delight.
TEXT_BANPEL105_05203_ALPACAHANUHANU05203_100_005<tab>Easy girl, easy! They're just trying to keep you healthy!
TEXT_BANPEL105_05203_SYSTEM_000_007<tab>You hear the creature breathing softly. It seems completely at ease.
TEXT_BANPEL105_05203_SYSTEM_000_009<tab>You must have surprised the alpaca while it was drinking. Fortunately, it appears unoffended by the intrusion.
TEXT_BANPEL105_05203_YUBLI_000_010<tab>Thank you for handling that. How are the alpacas faring?

TEXT_BANPEL105_05203_YUBLI_000_011<tab>I see, I see... It always surprises me how creatures in the same herd can behave so differently. We'll have to make sure we cater to their individual temperaments!

TEXT_BANPEL105_05203_YUBLI_000_012<tab>The Hanu use the same repellent on their younglings. It's about as pungent as you'd expect for something that wards off the region's pests, but it's perfectly harmless.
TEXT_BANPEL105_05203_YUBLI_000_013<tab>The Turali Travel Agency relies as much on the alpacas as any other member of staff. They're just as deserving of the finest care!
